<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get Cellular Modules Sim Security (v2.0)</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/sdwan/v2.0/api/elements/{element_id}/cellular_modules/{cellular_module_id}/sim_security/{sim_security_id}"}></MethodEndpoint>



List the cellular module sim security information.

## Request

<details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}>Path Parameters</h3></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"description":"ID of the element.","in":"path","name":"element_id","required":true,"schema":{"description":"Element Id","type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"description":"ID of the cellular module.","in":"path","name":"cellular_module_id","required":true,"schema":{"description":"Cellular Module Id","type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"description":"ID of the sim security.","in":"path","name":"sim_security_id","required":true,"schema":{"description":"Sim Security Id","type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details><div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

Successful Operation

</div><div><MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"} schemaType={"response"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json"}><SchemaTabs className={"openapi-tabs__schema"}><TabItem label={"Schema"} value={"Schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details response"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-response"}><strong>Schema</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"description"} required={false} schemaName={""} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"The description of the sim security. Max size = 256.\n"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"id"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"The ID of the sim security.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"name"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"The name of the sim security. Max size = 128. \n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"pin"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"The pin of the sim security. Pin must be numeric with minimum 4 and maximum 8 digits.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"remove_pin"} required={true} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"The remove pin of the sim security.\n","type":"boolean"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"slot_number"} required={true} schemaName={"int32"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"The slot number of the sim.\n","format":"int32","type":"integer"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"tags"} required={false} schemaName={"string[]"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"An information field that can be added to identify the sim security. Maximum 10 unique tags of length 1024 each are allowed.\n","items":{"description":"Tags","type":"string"},"type":"array"}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem><TabItem label={"Example (from schema)"} value={"Example (from schema)"}><ResponseSamples responseExample={"{\n  \"id\": \"string\",\n  \"name\": \"string\",\n  \"pin\": \"string\",\n  \"remove_pin\": true,\n  \"slot_number\": 0,\n  \"tags\": [\n    \"string\"\n  ]\n}"} language={"json"}></ResponseSamples></TabItem></SchemaTabs></TabItem></MimeTabs></div></TabItem></ApiTabs></div></div>
